attributes.action: Adequate financial support for sole traders recieving £400 p/m or less from gov.
attributes.additional_details: Be fair. Self employed/sole traders are tax payers working very hard each day, often without pay. Want to feel valued. Thank you for listening.
attributes.background: Look at what you are paying self employed people during the covid-19 pandemic, telling us we can not work. Feel the grant should be based on the latest tax return. All self employed who have filed a tax return to be granted adequate grant, minimum cap £500 per/month.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Pay self employed workers a wage due to lack of earnings caused by COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303345

Extend Self-Employment income support in alignment with the Job Retention scheme: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320655

Pay self-employed workers 80% of gross income during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309231

Get HMRC to refund the Self-Employed their Jan 2020 1st Tax Payment on Account: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304995

Blanket payment for the self-employed similar to the AU and US stimulus payment: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318666
